name: 數學物理（三）
description: 銜接數學物理~(一、二) 的內容，介紹物理中會遇到的進階數學方法，以作修習物理系高年級理論科目的基礎。
goals: 簡介數學方法在物理中的應用
syllabus:
Depending on the progress, the feedback as well as the requests from the registered students, we may skip some topics listed below and introduce others.

Weeks 1 to 4: topic: Integral Transform.

1\. Introduction to Laplace Transform (LT) and various related theorems and formulas associated with LT. 

2\. Inverse Laplace transform and its applications in Physics and other scientific fields.

3\. Introduction to Fourier Transform (FT) and various related theorems and formulas associated with FT. 

4. Applications of FT in Physics and other scientific fields.

Week 5: First midterm exam. 

Weeks 6 to 9: topic: Complex Analysis.

1. Complex Functions and their differentials.

2\. Cauchy-Riemann equations and Harmonic Functions.

3. Sequence and Power Series.

4\. Complex Integration, Taylor and Laurent Series, and Residue Theory.

Week 10: Second midterm.

Weeks 11 to 13: Conformal Mapping and its applications in various fields of science and engineering.

Weeks 14 to 15: Special topics such as Special functions or Green functions (students can make their suggestions).

Final week: Final exam.

methodologies.note: For practicing purpose, there might be weekly or biweekly assignements

grading.note: There will be two in class open book midterm exams.
There will be one in class open book final exam.
